shri lankan aayathanaya guwan yana bandu ganima miladi ganima aadi karunu waladi menma sewakayan deshapalana kriyakarakamwalata yoda ganimin karana lada dushana wishala pramanayak waliamuna warthawa mangin helidaraw wi athi bawa penwa dun amathyawaraya,thama amathyawaraya lesa sitinathak ee waradi sandaha daduwam dima sandaha kapa wi kriyakarana bawata sewakayanta poronduwak laba dunneya.danatamath adala parikshana katayuthu siduwemin pawathina bawa penwa dun amathyawaraya guwan yana miladi ganim sambandhayen mulya aparadha kottashaya mangin parikshanayak siduwemin thibena bawath penwa dunneya.
